series_name: Etac Tray for Cross and Prio wheelchairs with std. Cross arm supports
original_description: The tray for the Cross and Prio wheelchairs is transparent and can be mounted on long standard Cross armrests.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Etac Tray is designed specifically for Cross and Prio wheelchairs and is compatible with standard Cross armrests. The tray is transparent, allowing for easy visibility and cleaning. It provides a convenient surface for holding items such as meals, books, or electronic devices, making daily activities more accessible and comfortable for wheelchair users. The tray is securely mounted on the armrests, ensuring stability and safety during use.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily tasks
Optimize mobility and accessibility of everyday objects
Improve convenience in dining
Improve convenience in educational settings

original_description: Tasty glass is easy to handle thanks to the light weight and the design, inspired by a wine glass. It can easily be lifted without gripping the shaft. Just put the index finger and thumb around the shaft and the bowl of the glass will rest against the hand. Machine washable at 65. Measure 3 dl, weight 75 g. Material: polycarbonate.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Etac Tasty Glass is a uniquely designed drinking vessel that combines functionality with a touch of elegance. Inspired by the classic wine glass, this glass is crafted from polycarbonate, making it lightweight and durable. Its design allows for easy handling, as users can simply place their index finger and thumb around the shaft, with the bowl of the glass resting comfortably against the hand. This design is particularly beneficial for individuals with limited hand strength or grip issues. The glass is machine washable at 65 degrees Celsius, ensuring easy cleaning and maintenance. With a capacity of 3 dl and weighing only 75 grams, it is both practical and user-friendly.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living activities
Improve the overall dining experience and enjoyment of meals

series_name: SAFE Med pressure relieving Anatomical seat cushion no. 118 Pink
original_description:
SAFE Med pressure relieving Anatomical seat cushion keeps the person back in the chair without the risk to slide forward. Stabilizes the right position of the legs.
The pressure is especially relieved under the thighs and tailbone. 
Is ideal for people with amputated legs.
Machine wash up to 95 C,tumble dry. Buy cover separately.
Use up to stage 3

LLM_output.detailed_description: The SAFE Med pressure relieving Anatomical seat cushion is designed to keep individuals securely positioned in their chair, preventing forward sliding. It effectively stabilizes the correct position of the legs, particularly beneficial for those with amputated legs. The cushion is engineered to relieve pressure under the thighs and tailbone, providing comfort and support. It is suitable for use up to stage 3 and can be machine washed at temperatures up to 95°C. A separate cover is available for purchase.
goals: Promote optimal seated posture and positioning
Engage in activities requiring comfortable seating
Minimize the risk of pressure sores and ulcers
Enhance stamina in daily living

series_name: Immedia OneWayGlide, short (NonSlip) one direction glide cushion
original_description: Immedia OneWayGlide is a sliding pad that slides easily in one direction and stops in the opposite. It is suitable for users who have difficulty maintaining a correct seated position. OneWayGlide makes it easier to move independently or with helpers.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Immedia OneWayGlide is a specialized sliding pad designed to facilitate easier movement for individuals who have difficulty maintaining a correct seated position. This product is particularly useful for those who need assistance with transferring or repositioning. The pad slides smoothly in one direction while providing resistance in the opposite direction, ensuring controlled and safe movement. It is constructed with a durable, non-slip material that enhances safety and stability. The pad is available in a short size, making it suitable for various seating arrangements, and it can be used both at home and in clinical settings. The OneWayGlide is designed to support independent movement or to aid caregivers in repositioning users with minimal effort.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily tasks
Enhance mobility and ease of movement
Minimize the risk of pressure-related injuries and discomfort
Enable safe and controlled transfers with minimal assistance
Improve overall well-being through comfort and safety
healthcare_challenges: Conditions affecting muscle control and coordination

original_description: Clamshell phone with safety button with Doro response software. Provides access to emergency calls and remote control of the mobile. Compatible with Doro 3500, emergency call bracelet. Compatible with hearing aids with a T4 / M4 HAC rating. Max. sound amplification of 35 dB and maximum ring strength of 75 dB (A) at 1 meter.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Doro 6041 mobile phone is a user-friendly clamshell phone designed with accessibility and ease of use in mind. It features a safety button that allows users to quickly access emergency services. The phone is equipped with Doro response software, which provides additional safety features and remote control capabilities. It is compatible with the Doro 3500 emergency call bracelet, enhancing personal safety. The device is also compatible with hearing aids that have a T4/M4 HAC rating, with a maximum sound amplification of 35 dB and a maximum ring strength of 75 dB (A) at 1 meter, making it suitable for users with hearing impairments. The phone's design and features aim to provide a reliable and accessible communication tool for users who prioritize safety and simplicity.
goals: Promote autonomy and personal safety
Facilitate social connections and relationships
Communicate over the telephone
Enable rapid access to emergency services
Improve communication for individuals with hearing impairments
healthcare_challenges: Healthcare challenges that require prompt emergency response

series_name: Hand operated Avant loader and tool carriers
original_description: Hand operated Avant HDC loaders and tool carriers. Multifunctional machines aimed at wheelchair users and people with mobility difficulties. Capacity from 350kg and up to 1.6 tons, and the program of accessories for mounting on machines extends over 100 different configurations, to cope with whatever one might encounter.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Hand Operated Avant HDC loaders and tool carriers are versatile, multifunctional machines specifically designed to assist wheelchair users and individuals with mobility difficulties. These loaders come in various models with capacities ranging from 350 kg to 1.6 tons. The extensive range of accessories, totaling over 100 configurations, allows users to tailor the machine to their specific needs, making it an invaluable tool for tackling a wide array of tasks.
goals: Enhance work productivity and job retention
Independent home and property maintenance

series_name: Yellow badge with needle and english text
original_description:
Yellow badge with needle and english text:
I am Deaf and Visually Impaired.

LLM_output.detailed_description: This item is a bright yellow button badge with a needle attachment on the back, designed to be worn on clothing or accessories. The badge features bold, black text that reads 'I am Deaf and Visually Impaired.' This badge serves as a visual indicator of the wearer's sensory impairments, helping others to recognize and accommodate their needs. The badge is small and lightweight, making it easy to attach to various items such as bags, jackets, or lanyards.
goals: To promote public awareness and understanding of sensory impairments.
To prioritize personal safety and well-being through clear communication of specific needs.

series_name: ClickToPhone - for switch controle of tablet / smartphone
original_description: With embedded bluetooth the ClickTophone enable switch users to operate a smart phone or tablet. Switch users are now able to use a smart phone for answering and making calls, writing and receiving text messages and using social media. The Click to phone is available now, and can be delivered ready for use with smartphone or tablet.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The ClickToPhone is a revolutionary assistive technology device designed to enable switch users to operate smartphones and tablets with ease. Equipped with embedded Bluetooth technology, this device allows individuals with limited mobility to engage with their digital devices in a seamless and intuitive manner. Users can now answer and make calls, write and receive text messages, and interact with social media platforms, all through the use of a switch. The ClickToPhone is available for immediate use, ensuring that switch users can start leveraging the full capabilities of their smartphones and tablets right away.
goals: Promote autonomy
Foster social connections through modern technology
Maximize productivity and engagement in personal and professional spheres
Facilitate lifelong learning through accessible educational resources
Use information technology independently
healthcare_challenges: Motor impairments that limit fine motor skills
Amputation affecting the use of hands

original_description:
Foldable anatomic walking for right or left handed.
Adjustable from 81-91 cm.
Max user weight: 114 kg.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Foldable Anatomic Walking Stick is a versatile and adjustable mobility aid designed to provide support and stability for individuals who need assistance with walking. This walking stick is suitable for both right and left-handed users and can be adjusted to fit a range of heights, from 81 cm to 91 cm. Constructed with durability in mind, it has a maximum user weight capacity of 114 kg. The stick features an ergonomic handle designed to reduce strain on the hand and wrist, making it comfortable for extended use. Its foldable design allows for easy storage and transportation, making it a convenient choice for those on the go.
goals: Promote everyday mobility in all settings
Mitigate fall risk
Access outdoor activities, including walking in the community and natural areas
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairment not requiring a wheelchair
Age-related decline in mobility and balance

original_description: The air-tight containers are stackable and space-saving. The containers have a push-button function which creates an airtight seal with just a touch. The button also serves as a handle to lift the lid.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Airtight One-Hand Food Container is a versatile and user-friendly kitchen storage solution designed to keep food fresh and organized. The container features a unique push-button mechanism that allows for easy opening and closing with just one hand, making it ideal for individuals with limited hand mobility or strength. The airtight seal ensures that the contents remain fresh for longer periods, reducing food waste. The stackable design maximizes storage space, and the transparent material allows for easy identification of the contents. The button also functions as a handle for lifting the lid, adding to the convenience and ease of use.
goals: Promote autonomy in meal preparation and retrieval
Organise daily routines and one's home
healthcare_challenges: Arthritis and other hand mobility issues
Limited dexterity and strength in hands
Conditions requiring one-handed operation of tools

original_description: Comde original lowerpart large (pear-shaped)

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Comde original lowerpart large (pear-shaped) is an accessory for guide or tactile canes.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living
Facilitate physical navigation and mobility in the community

original_description: HipGuard is an airbag belt that protects against hip fractures in a fall accident. HipGuard is placed around the hips and when a fall is detected, an airbag will automatically inflate, providing optimal protection for your hip. HipGuard provides great freedom of movement and is easy to use.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The HipGuard is an innovative airbag hip protector designed to enhance safety and provide peace of mind for individuals at risk of hip fractures due to falls. This device is worn around the hips and features advanced fall detection technology. When a fall is detected, the HipGuard automatically inflates an airbag, offering optimal protection to the hips. The belt is designed to provide great freedom of movement while ensuring comfort and ease of use. It is particularly useful for elderly individuals or those with mobility challenges who are more susceptible to falls.
goals: Minimize injury risk from falls
Enable safe participation in community and physical occupational activities

series_name: Alpha Armrest - Height and vertical adjustable without tools
original_description:
Alpha Armrest height and vertical adjustable for wall mounting.
Height and vertical adjustable without using any tools.
Can be raised to upright position and locked.
Extra reinforced execution.
White powder coating. Length: 900 mm
Toilet roll paper holder - (optional model 6006).

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Alpha Armrest is a versatile and user-friendly assistive device designed for wall mounting. Its key feature is the ability to adjust both the height and vertical position without the need for any tools, making it highly adaptable to different user needs and preferences. The armrest can be raised to an upright position and securely locked in place, ensuring stability and safety. Constructed with an extra-reinforced execution, it boasts durability and reliability. The armrest is coated in a white powder finish, providing a clean and aesthetic appearance suitable for various environments. With a length of 900 mm, it offers ample support. Additionally, an optional toilet roll paper holder (model 6006) can be integrated for added convenience.
goals: Enhance comfort and safety in the bathroom

series_name: Etac Cut, Cutting board with adjustable frame
original_description: Allows a person with tremors or impaired vision to cut safely. The cutting board with adjustable frame makes it easy to cut bread slices - the knife lies stably in the guide track and the stop block regulates the thickness of the slices. Machine washable at 65. Length 35.5 cm, width 20 cm, weight 415 g. Material: polystyrene.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Etac Cut is a specialized cutting board designed to assist individuals with tremors, impaired vision, or motor skill impairments in safely and independently performing kitchen tasks. The cutting board features an adjustable frame that ensures stability and precision during cutting, and a guide track that securely holds the knife in place, preventing it from slipping. The stop block allows for consistent slice thickness, promoting independence and safety in the kitchen. The cutting board is made of polystyrene and is machine washable at 65 degrees Celsius, ensuring easy cleaning and maintenance. With dimensions of 35.5 cm in length and 20 cm in width, and weighing 415 grams, it is both lightweight and durable.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living activities
Enhance safety in the home
Facilitate independent meal preparation

original_description:
ThevoCalm matress system is optimally tailored to the sleep and lying needs of persons with Parkinson. The mattress has a firm density foam that provides a secure feeling when lying. It has wing suspensions that adapt individually to the body zones. Micro-Stimulation improves body perception.
Result: improved sleep and more energy in the daytime.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The ThevoCalm mattress system is specifically designed to meet the sleep and lying needs of individuals with Parkinson's disease. The mattress features a firm density foam that provides a secure and comfortable feeling while lying down. It includes wing suspensions that adapt individually to different body zones, ensuring personalized support and comfort. Additionally, the mattress incorporates micro-stimulation technology, which helps improve body perception, leading to better sleep quality and increased energy levels during the day.
goals: Improve sleep quality and improve energy levels in daily life.
Enhance sleep comfort

LLM_output.detailed_description: The GTM GTM1 wheelchair is a high-quality, sporty wheelchair designed for active users who require mobility assistance. It features a lightweight and durable aluminum frame, ensuring easy maneuverability and long-lasting use. The wheelchair is equipped with large rear wheels with push rims for self-propulsion, and smaller front casters for stability. The seat and backrest are upholstered in a vibrant red fabric, providing both comfort and style. The design includes adjustable backrest and seat height, allowing for customization to fit the user's specific needs. The wheelchair also features a foldable backrest for easy transportation and storage.
goals: Enhance mobility and accessibility across all domains of life
Facilitate participation in leisure and recreational activities
Be comfortable throughout the day

series_name: SAFE Med pressure relieving Ear Pillow no. 115
original_description:
SAFE Med pressure relieving Ear Pillow prevents pressure ulcers and promotes healing supplying pain relief with comfortable pressure relief of the ear lying on the side.
BUY the very skin friendly Soft-Cell cover, Comfor PUR or Cotton velvet cover. See specifications below.
Machine wash up to 95 C, tumble dry.
Use with Yellow soft side up.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The SAFE Med pressure relieving Ear Pillow is designed to prevent pressure ulcers and promote healing, particularly for individuals who lie on their side for extended periods. The pillow is constructed to provide comfortable pressure relief specifically for the ear, helping to alleviate pain and discomfort. It comes with a very skin-friendly Soft-Cell cover, available in Comfor PUR or Cotton velvet, ensuring a soft and comfortable experience. The pillow is durable and easy to maintain, as it can be machine washed at temperatures up to 95°C and tumble-dried. For optimal comfort and effectiveness, the pillow should be used with the yellow side facing up.
goals: Optimize sleep comfort and prevent discomfort
Enhance healing and prevent pressure ulcers
Improve overall sleep quality and pain management
healthcare_challenges: Pressure ulcers and skin breakdown due to prolonged lying on one side

original_description: A series of fit-over glasses at reasonable prices, with glasses that block the most short-waved blue and violet light, and further reduces the incoming light by 65, 75 or 85. All MaxProtect frames have side windows that prevents glare from sneaking in from the sides, as with ordinary sunglasses and filter glasses.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The MaxProtect is a series of fit-over glasses designed to provide comprehensive eye protection at an affordable price. These glasses are engineered to block the most harmful short-waved blue and violet light, which can be detrimental to eye health. Additionally, they further reduce incoming light by 65%, 75%, or 85%, making them ideal for various lighting conditions. One of the standout features of MaxProtect glasses is their side windows, which prevent glare from sneaking in from the sides, a common issue with ordinary sunglasses and filter glasses. This design ensures maximum protection and comfort for the user.
goals: Maintain eye health and prevent long-term damage from harmful light exposure.
To enhance visual comfort and clarity in diverse lighting environments.
To minimize eye strain and fatigue during extended use of digital devices.
Reduce glare and eyesight damage from outdoor activities, including those of an occupational and recreational nature.

original_description: Filter goggles, Fit-Over with PC filter glass in black matt polycarbonate spectacle frame, size 63-12. Designed for use outside on own existing glasses. Comes in C1, 450, C500 and 511 in combination with and without Gray 60. Block the dangerous short-wave blue light.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The SCHWEIZER IV Proshield Fit-Over are advanced filter goggles designed to be worn over existing glasses. Crafted with a black matt polycarbonate spectacle frame, these goggles feature PC filter glass that effectively blocks harmful short-wave blue light. Available in various filter categories including C1, 450, C500, and 511, these goggles are ideal for outdoor use and provide an additional layer of protection for the eyes. The design ensures comfort and compatibility with most existing eyewear, making them a versatile choice for individuals seeking enhanced eye protection.
goals: Safeguard eyes and promote long-term eye health.
To ensure unobstructed vision while accommodating existing eyewear during various outdoor activities.
Reduce eyestrain and fatigue from screen use, including in professional occupational activities
Improve sleep quality
healthcare_challenges: Addressing eye discomfort due to intense light and glare.

original_description: 3-edged plastic grip that fits pencils and standard pens. Finger-shaped grip. Made of soft plastic. Ass. colors. Package of 3.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The item is a 3-edged plastic grip designed to fit pencils and standard pens. It has a finger-shaped design made of soft plastic, which provides a comfortable and secure grip. The grip is available in various colors and comes in a package of three. This assistive technology is particularly useful for individuals who may have difficulty holding writing instruments due to conditions affecting their grip or hand strength. Users can improve their ability to write legibly in vocational and academic settings.
goals: To optimize writing experience and minimize physical strain
To promote fine motor skills development and precision
To foster autonomy in daily activities involving writing and signing
Participate and thrive in primary and secondary education
healthcare_challenges: Arthritis and other hand conditions affecting grip
Dyspraxia and other conditions affecting fine motor skills
Neurological conditions such as Parkinson's disease or multiple sclerosis

series_name: Intelligaze 3 Eye control module for Rolltalk
original_description: Intelligaze 3 Eye control module for Rolltalk

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Intelligaze 3 Eye control module for Rolltalk is an advanced assistive technology designed to enable individuals with physical disabilities to interact with computers using eye-tracking technology. This device allows users to control a computer cursor and perform various actions, such as clicking, dragging, and typing, using only their eyes. The module is compatible with a range of devices and software, making it a versatile tool for enhancing accessibility and independence. It is particularly useful for individuals with conditions that affect their ability to use traditional input devices, such as muscular dystrophy, ALS, or spinal cord injuries.
goals: Enable independent use of information technology
Facilitate effective communication and social engagement
Promote access to education and career advancement
healthcare_challenges: Severe physical disabilities that limit use of hands or limbs
Conditions affecting fine motor skills and coordination
Progressive neurological diseases that impact mobility and communication
Temporary or permanent paralysis due to injury or illness

series_name: Krabat Jockey Bacic with Electrical assistance
original_description: The Krabat Jockey Basic is an active chair with saddle seat for children aged 6-18 years. The height adjustment is operated with a remote control on the electric undercarriage. The wide-legged sitting position, together with the foot width, stabilises the pelvis and reduces the need for upper body support.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Krabat Jockey Basic is a chair designed specifically for children aged 6 to 18 years. This chair features a saddle seat that promotes a wide-legged sitting position, which helps to stabilize the pelvis and reduce the need for upper body support. The height adjustment mechanism is operated via a remote control on the electric undercarriage, allowing for easy and precise adjustments to suit the user's needs. This chair is ideal for children who require additional support and stability while seated, making it a valuable tool for enhancing comfort and promoting proper posture.
goals: Improve posture
Improve seated comfort
Minimise hip pain
Facilitate concentration and engagement in educational and social settings

original_description:
Drooling scarves for children with special needs.
Sizes: unique
Ages: 3 to 12 years
Colors: sage green, sand/beige
- GOTS & OEKO-TEX 100 organic cotton
- Absorbent layer on the outside
- Waterproof layer on the inside
- Easier collection of saliva/food debris
- 3 snaps closure for different neck widths
- Imprinted product data for skin protection

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Favne Scarf is a specialized drooling scarf designed for children with special needs. Crafted from premium organic cotton, it is available in sage green and sand/beige colors. The scarf features an absorbent layer on the outside to effectively manage drooling, while a waterproof layer on the inside ensures comfort and prevents skin irritation. The scarf includes a 3-snap closure system, allowing for adjustable neck widths to provide a secure and comfortable fit. Additionally, the scarf is imprinted with product data to enhance skin protection.
goals: Promote hygiene
Prevent skin irritation

series_name: Quha Zono X head-controlled Bluetooth mouse
original_description: Discreet small head-controlled mouse with Bluetooth. For your computer, smartphone, tablet and the like. You can connect one or more 0/1 switches via bluetooth or use dwell software for mouse clicks.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Quha Zono X is a discreet, head-controlled Bluetooth mouse designed to provide users with an alternative means of controlling their computer, smartphone, or tablet. Ideal for individuals with limited hand mobility, this device allows for precise cursor control using head movements. It can be connected to one or more external switches via Bluetooth, enabling users to perform mouse clicks and other functions. The device is compact and unobtrusive, making it suitable for various environments and activities.
goals: Independent use of information technology
Facilitate effective digital communication
Engage in educational and professional pursuits

original_description:
Rexton Charging Station is a smart and practical charger for your hearing aids that charges your hearing aids fast. The charger is designed as a closed box that protects, transports and charges your hearing aids.
The charger can be used with USB, making it easy to charge your hearing aids wherever you are.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Rexton Charging Station is a sophisticated and user-friendly device designed to efficiently charge hearing aids. Its compact, closed-box design not only protects and transports your hearing aids but also ensures they are charged quickly and safely. The charger is compatible with USB, allowing for convenient charging anywhere, whether at home or on the go. This device is particularly beneficial for individuals who rely on hearing aids to maintain their quality of life and stay connected with their environment.
goals: Facilitate active engagement in social, academic and professional environments
Travel
Reduce fatigue

original_description: Cylinderpuden kan anvendes til mange formål. F.eks til elevering af hæle, mellem benene, som støtte til ryg i sideleje.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Cylinder X-Small is a versatile assistive technology item designed to support various needs. It can be used for elevating legs, positioning between the knees, or as a back support during side-lying exercises. Its compact size makes it suitable for a range of activities, from personal care to physical therapy. The cylinder is made of durable, lightweight material, ensuring it is both portable and long-lasting. It is particularly useful for individuals who require support during daily activities or therapeutic exercises.
goals: Relieve swelling
Reduce back pain

original_description:
The mattress has the same type of foam throughout. The foam has a high bulk density which ensures a long life. The elastic material and the high load bearing capacity, and
the cuts in the mattress gives optimum sleeping comfort.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Kappa mattress is designed with a consistent type of foam throughout its structure, ensuring uniformity and comfort. The high bulk density of the foam guarantees durability and longevity, making it a reliable choice for long-term use. The mattress features an elastic material that provides excellent support and a high load-bearing capacity, which is particularly beneficial for users who require robust and stable sleeping surfaces. Additionally, the strategic cuts in the mattress enhance sleeping comfort by promoting proper alignment and reducing pressure points.
goals: Improve sleep quality, leading to greater energy for daily activities.
healthcare_challenges: Sleep disorders that benefit from properly aligned and pressure-relieving mattresses.

original_description: A solid back system is essential for proper positioning. Well suited for users needing additional support, or with a tilt-recline system.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Varilite Icon back system Tall is a robust and supportive back system designed to provide optimal positioning for wheelchair users. This back system is particularly well-suited for individuals who require additional support or those who use a tilt-recline system. It features a sturdy construction that ensures stability and comfort, making it ideal for users who need extra assistance with posture and alignment. The back system is designed to be adjustable, allowing for personalized fitting to meet the specific needs of the user. Its durable materials ensure longevity and reliability, making it a valuable addition to any wheelchair setup.
goals: Promote posture and alignment
Improve comfort when using a wheelchair
Enhance mobility

original_description: Grab rail made from white-painted steel that can hold up to 200 kg depending on the strength of the wall. The grab rail comes in different sizes: 16-25 cm. for use by the toilet, 30-50 cm for use in the shower and 60-90 cm for use along the bathtub. The grab rail is mounted with 3 screws in each side.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Steel Grab Rail is a versatile and robust assistive device designed to enhance safety and stability in various settings, such as bathrooms and toilets. Made from durable white-painted steel, this grab rail can support up to 200 kg, depending on the wall's strength. It is available in different sizes to suit specific needs: 16-25 cm for use by the toilet, 30-50 cm for use in the shower, and 60-90 cm for use along the bathtub. The grab rail is securely mounted with three screws on each side, ensuring a stable and reliable grip for users. This product is ideal for enhancing safety and independence in daily activities.
goals: Promote autonomy and safety in daily routines
Minimize the risk of accidents and injuries resulting from falls
healthcare_challenges: Individuals recovering from surgery or injury
People with neurological conditions affecting balance and coordination

original_description: MATRIX Medium vanity wash basins for mounting on MATRIX manual basin unit with concealed plumbing. They have two integrated handrails in the front. The wash basin has raised edges, preventing water from running over the back or down the outer sides.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The MATRIX Medium vanity wash basin is designed for mounting on MATRIX manual basin units with concealed plumbing. This wash basin features two integrated handrails in the front, providing additional support and safety for users. The basin has raised edges, which effectively prevent water from running over the back or down the outer sides, ensuring a cleaner and more hygienic environment. This product is ideal for enhancing accessibility and convenience in bathroom settings.
goals: Promote autonomy in personal care activities
Minimize risk of injury or falls and promote safety in bathroom environments
Enable good hygiene
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments affecting balance and stability
Conditions necessitating additional support for personal hygiene
Age-related declines in strength and coordination

original_description: På balancemåtten får du trænet kroppen imens du arbejder. Underlaget sørger for at styrke dine muskler mens du står - og samtidig øges blodcirkulation, så du får en god og behagelig stående arbejdsdag. Det anbefales at bruge den uden sko da du så får mest mulig udfordring i måtten. Og så skåner du samtidig måttens overflade.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Balancematte 47 x 38 x 6 cm, is a specialized balance mat designed to improve posture and muscle strength while standing. This gray balance mat is ideal for use in an office setting, particularly for those who spend extended periods standing. The mat encourages proper posture by requiring the user to maintain balance, thereby engaging and strengthening core and leg muscles. It is recommended to use the mat without shoes to maximize the balance challenge and to protect the mat's surface. This product is designed to enhance overall physical well-being by promoting better circulation and reducing the strain associated with prolonged standing.
goals: Improve physical fitness and muscle strength
Enhance posture and reduce the risk of work-related injuries
Promote better circulation and reduce fatigue during long hours of standing
Encourage regular movement and muscle engagement
healthcare_challenges: Poor circulation due to sedentary work

original_description: The donning aid for closed toe compression stockings and tights.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Magnide is a specialized donning aid designed to facilitate the easy and efficient wearing of closed-toe compression stockings and tights. This device is particularly useful for individuals who may have difficulty bending down or reaching their feet due to mobility issues, arthritis, or other physical limitations. The Magnide features a sturdy, ergonomic handle and a smooth, gliding surface that helps to slide the stockings or tights up the leg with minimal effort. Its lightweight and portable design make it a convenient tool for use at home or on the go.
goals: Achieve autonomy in self-care routines and daily life
healthcare_challenges: Inability to bend over or reach

original_description:
Wrist support - among other things for stabilizing the joint between the radius and the ulna. Made of soft inelastic material (nylon and neoprene).
Fits both right and left side.
Instructions included.
One size

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Smart Strap is a versatile wrist support designed to stabilize the joint between the radius and the ulna. Crafted from a combination of nylon and neoprene, it offers a soft yet inelastic material that provides effective support without restricting movement. This strap is suitable for both the right and left wrist, making it a versatile choice for users with varying needs. The one-size-fits-all design ensures a comfortable fit for most individuals. Included with the product are detailed instructions to help users properly apply and adjust the strap for optimal support and comfort.
goals: Alleviate discomfort and pain associated with wrist conditions
Improve range of motion and fine motor activity, including grip, grasping heavy objects and rotation
Prevent exacerbation of wrist injuries through consistent support

series_name: Low vision cube with white tactil eyes
original_description: Low vision cube with white tactil eyes

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Low Vision Cube with White Tactile Eyes is a specialized gaming accessory designed to enhance the gaming experience for individuals with visual impairments. This item includes a set of five dice, each with distinct colors (black, yellow, red, blue, and white) and large, tactile white dots that are easily distinguishable by touch. The dice are made from durable, high-quality materials, ensuring longevity and ease of use. This product is particularly useful for individuals who enjoy board games, dice games, or other activities that require the use of dice but may have difficulty seeing the standard small dots. Dice are also occasionally used as learning aids in primary school activities.
goals: Promote inclusive and accessible recreational activities
Participate in communal social activities
Build relationships
Participate in primary and numeracy education
healthcare_challenges: Visual impairments, including low vision and blindness
Motor skill challenges that affect fine motor coordination

original_description:
An elastic protection which provides protection and cushioning for problems and pain during ball of the foot.
With a filling of gel, which gives a very good shock-absorbing effect.
Elastic material which makes it suitable for multiple sizes.
Can be used on both right and left foot.
Protective, relieve pain, moisturize the skin, washable.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Ball Foot Protector is an innovative assistive technology designed to provide relief and protection for individuals experiencing discomfort or pain in the ball of the foot. This device features an elastic material that ensures a comfortable and secure fit for various foot sizes, making it versatile for both the right and left foot. The gel filling offers excellent shock absorption, reducing the impact on the ball of the foot and providing cushioning support. Additionally, the protector helps to moisturize the skin, ensuring that the foot remains healthy and comfortable. It is washable, making it easy to clean and maintain hygiene. Ideal for those suffering from conditions such as metatarsalgia or other foot-related issues, this protector aims to enhance mobility and comfort.
goals: To promote pain-free physical activity
To optimize foot health and well-being
Enhance comfort and mobility during daily activities
Work in a physically active occupation
healthcare_challenges: Foot pain due to high arches or flat feet

original_description:
Disinfects 99.99 of bacteria, viruses and microorganisms with UVC LED light without the use of chemicals and thereby less risk of allergic reactions.
It filters the air from bacteria and viruses to protect staff and patients. Smooth metal surface that is easy to clean, available in black and white
Weight 5,6 Kg
200-240V
Capacity 70 M3/h
Noise 40 db

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Whitebox Aircleaner is a state-of-the-art air purification system designed to disinfect 99.99% of bacteria, viruses, and microorganisms using UVC LED light. This innovative device eliminates the need for chemicals, thereby reducing the risk of allergic reactions. Ideal for healthcare settings, it effectively filters the air to protect both staff and patients. The unit features a smooth metal surface that is easy to clean and is available in both black and white. With a weight of 5.6 kg, it operates within a voltage range of 200-240V and has a capacity of 70 M3/h. The noise level is maintained at 40 db, ensuring minimal disruption in the environment.
goals: Minimize the spread of infectious diseases
Optimize air quality in diverse environments

original_description: et skinnebensbind designet til at reducere smerter ved skinnebensbetændelse. Skinnebensbindet har en åbent design, som sikre en korrekt pasform. Materialet er tyndt og åndbart og mindsker dermed ubehag, f.eks. ved sport.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Skinnebensbind SS-1 is a specialized ankle support designed to alleviate pain associated with ankle inflammation. Featuring an open design, it ensures a proper fit while providing targeted support to the ankle area. Constructed from thin, breathable materials, it minimizes discomfort, making it particularly suitable for use during physical activities and sports. This support is designed to offer stability and reduce the risk of further injury, making it an essential tool for individuals suffering from ankle issues.
goals: Promote pain-free physical activity
Participate in sports and exercise
Minimize the risk of recurring ankle injuries

series_name: Soft seat for Aquatec Ocean chairs
original_description: For maximum comfort, Invacare offers a range of soft seats for Aquatec Ocean.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Soft Seat for Aquatec Ocean chairs is designed to provide maximum comfort for users who require assistance with mobility and toileting. This seat is specifically engineered to fit Aquatec Ocean chairs, a shower and toilet chair, offering a cushioned surface that enhances comfort during use. The seat is easy to attach and remove, ensuring versatility and convenience for users and caregivers alike. It is constructed from durable, easy-to-clean materials, making it suitable for use in various settings, including homes, hospitals, and care facilities.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living by making toilets and showers accessible
Maintain personal hygiene
Facilitate safe and comfortable personal care routines

series_name: Thomas the Tank Engine - Switch Adapted Toy
original_description: Thomas the Tank Engine for 0/1 switch is more than a toy its a ticket to adventure and learning for children with special needs. Designed to enhance motor and cognitive skills, It offers safe and creative play, opening up a world of imagination and discovery. The switches are not included, but can be purchased separately. Requires adult supervision

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Thomas the Tank Engine - Switch Adapted Toy is a delightful and educational play item designed for children with special needs. This toy is modeled after the beloved character from the popular children's series, making it instantly recognizable and appealing to young fans. The switch-adapted feature allows it to be used with external switches (sold separately), which can help children develop motor skills and hand-eye coordination. The toy is constructed with safety and durability in mind, ensuring it can withstand active play. It is designed to promote imaginative play, cognitive development, and social interaction, making it a valuable tool for both home and therapeutic settings. By selecting the directionality of the toy, users are encouraged to exercise choice and observe cause and effect relationships of their actions. Requires adult supervision.
goals: Improve fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination
Foster imaginative and creative thinking
Facilitate social skills and communication
Support cognitive growth and learning
Encourage choice making
Promote independence and self-confidence

original_description: Suitable for men and women who wants a stronger compression sock in cotton.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Strong Compression Sock is designed to provide effective support and compression for individuals seeking relief from various leg and foot conditions. Made from high-quality cotton, these socks offer a comfortable fit while delivering the necessary compression to improve blood circulation and reduce swelling. Ideal for those who stand for extended periods, have varicose veins, or require post-surgical support, these socks come in sizes suitable for both men and women.
goals: Prevent health complications from poor circulation
Optimize comfort and stamina during daily activities and work
Minimize the risk of blood clots and varicose veins
Facilitate recovery and rehabilitation after medical procedures

original_description: Lydoptager til notater, undervisning og musik, med en intern hukommelse på 12GB. Afspiller over hovedtelefon, højttaler eller et anlæg via den indbyggede FM-sender. Indbygget ur, stopur og minutur. MP3- og fuldbyrdes DAISY-afspiller. Super hurti USB3-interface. Kompatibel med Fame farvetester og Agenda kalenderfunktionen.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Milestone M312 Ace is a versatile and advanced digital recorder designed for note-taking, education, and music. It features a substantial internal memory of 12GB, allowing for extensive recording sessions. The device supports playback through headphones, speakers, or an external device via its built-in FM transmitter. It includes a built-in clock, stopwatch, and timer, making it a multifunctional tool for various needs. The M312 Ace is compatible with MP3 and fully-featured DAISY audio formats, ensuring high-quality audio playback. Additionally, it boasts a USB-3 interface for fast data transfer. Additionally, it has an agenda calendar function, making it a comprehensive tool for both personal and professional use.
goals: Promote effective learning and knowledge retention
Facilitate accessible education for individuals with visual impairments
Optimize time management and productivity
Foster independent learning and skill development
healthcare_challenges: Visual impairments requiring audio-based learning materials
Learning disabilities benefiting from structured note-taking and playback
Cognitive challenges necessitating the use of timers and stopwatches for task management
Hearing impairments requiring FM transmitter compatibility for audio assistance

original_description:
The innovative design of the TriColor Table Lamp is perfect for desks, countertops, end tables and anywhere else you need a little more light.
the large control buttons on the lamp base make this model the optimal choice for the low vision people.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The TriColor Table Lamp is a versatile and user-friendly lighting solution designed for various surfaces such as desks, countertops, and end tables. Its innovative design features a long, adjustable arm that allows for precise positioning to meet specific lighting needs. The lamp includes large control buttons on its base, making it an optimal choice for individuals with low vision or motor impairments. The lamp offers color options to suit different tasks and preferences, enhancing both functionality and user experience.
goals: Reduce eye strain
Increase performance and concentration in work or study environments
healthcare_challenges: Motor impairments affecting fine motor skills

original_description:
MyMainBoard make and develop products for visual guiding.
The products are made in plastic, whit out any magnets or velcro.
The Pictograms are handdrawn stickers, that makes it easy to attach and chance if needed.
The design is simple and flexible.

LLM_output.detailed_description: MyMainBoard is a visual guiding system designed to assist individuals with organizing and managing their daily routines. The product consists of a plastic board with hand-drawn pictograms representing various activities and tasks. These pictograms are attached as stickers, making it easy to add, remove, or rearrange them as needed. The design is simple and flexible, allowing users to customize the board to fit their specific needs and routines. MyMainBoard aims to provide a clear and intuitive visual aid for individuals who benefit from structured, pictorial representations of their daily activities.
goals: Manage and plan daily routines
Foster independence in daily tasks
Alleviate stress related to missed tasks
Cultivate self-organization and time management skills
Facilitate effective communication and understanding of daily schedules
healthcare_challenges: Cognitive impairments affecting memory and organization

original_description: Two adjustment options: Fixed, like ordinary walking frames, or reciprocal (alternating), where one sides leg is held down while the other is moved. Better support for the user. Powder coated and height adjustable.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Tomtar walking rack is a versatile and supportive mobility aid designed to assist individuals with walking. It features two adjustment options: a fixed mode similar to traditional walking frames, and a reciprocal (alternating) mode where one side of the leg is held down while the other is moved, providing better support for the user. The frame is powder-coated for durability and has height-adjustable features to ensure a comfortable and secure fit for the user.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily routines
Enhance mobility
Mitigate fall risk
Foster active engagement in social and community life out of the home
healthcare_challenges: Neurological conditions (e.g., Parkinson's disease, multiple sclerosis)
Orthopedic conditions (e.g., hip or knee replacements)

original_description:
A series of smart lighting solutions offering the users illumination when needed with automatic on and off function from motion sensor and timer function.
The series is developed to help generate lighting in situations where the switch is not in near site or full room light is not wanted
Get out of bed with light immediately for safe movements

LLM_output.detailed_description: The mylight.me smart lighting system is designed to enhance safety and convenience in the home, particularly in low-light conditions. It features motion sensors that automatically turn on lights when movement is detected, ensuring that users can navigate their space without stumbling or turning on bright overhead lights. The system also includes a timer function for automatic shut-off, making it energy-efficient. Ideal for bedrooms, hallways, and bathrooms, this smart lighting solution aims to provide a sense of security and ease of use, especially for those who need to move around at night.
goals: To promote safe navigation within the home during low-light conditions.
To enhance autonomy and reduce reliance on assistance for nighttime activities.
Reduce disruption for cohabiting partner.
healthcare_challenges: Mobility challenges that require assistance with nighttime navigation.
Age-related declines in vision and mobility.
Conditions that cause frequent night awakenings and mobility needs, such as bladder disorders.

original_description: Træningsbold fra svenske Refit i høj kvalitet. Fremstillet af blød PVC og uden ftalaterne (syntetiske stoffer). Designet med et anti-burst-system, som sikrer bolden kan holde til stort pres. Kan bestilles i enten 60 cm eller 70 cm. Perfekt til hjemmetræning eller som stol på kontoret.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Træningsbold Refit Basic is a high-quality exercise ball designed for various fitness and physical therapy purposes. Made from soft PVC without phthalates, it ensures a safe and eco-friendly workout experience. The ball features an anti-burst system that guarantees it can withstand significant pressure, making it reliable for intense exercises. Available in two sizes, 60 cm and 70 cm, it is suitable for both home workouts and use as an office chair to improve posture and comfort. Its durable construction and versatile use make it an excellent addition to any fitness routine or workspace.
goals: Promote overall physical wellness and strength
Enhance balance and stability
Reduce back pain during prolonged sitting
Strengthen core muscles

original_description:
There are two toilet transfer slings available with or without head support. Both models come with a belt for increased support around the body and for safe positioning. The Dress Toileting Sling is suitable for those who have limited
mobility. The model with head support is designed for users who also have reduced head control.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Optislings - Dress Toileting Low is a specialized sling designed to assist individuals with limited mobility in transferring to and from the toilet. This sling features a belt for enhanced support around the body, ensuring safe positioning during the transfer process. There are two models available: one with head support, which is ideal for users with reduced head control, and one without head support. The sling is constructed with durable materials to provide comfort and security during use.
goals: Ensure safe and comfortable toilet use
Ensure personal autonomy and dignity
healthcare_challenges: Difficulty transferring from one position to another

original_description: MyDegrees speaking thermometer can measure inside and outside temperature and can also be used as a roasting thermometer. The temperature scale ranges from -29 degrees C to 240 degrees Celsius.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The MyDegrees Multifunction talking thermometer is a versatile device designed to measure a wide range of temperatures, making it suitable for various applications. It can measure both indoor and outdoor temperatures, as well as function as a roasting thermometer. The device features a digital display that can read temperatures ranging from -29 degrees Celsius to 240 degrees Celsius. The thermometer is equipped with a talking feature that verbally announces the temperature, making it accessible for users with visual impairments. Additionally, the device includes a probe for precise temperature readings. The thermometer is manufactured by TalkTech and is designed to be user-friendly, with large, easy-to-use buttons and a clear, audible interface.
goals: Promote autonomy in cooking activities
Ensure food safety
Ensure safety and comfort through precise temperature readings in living environment
healthcare_challenges: Sensory or cognitive impairments that affect the ability to perceive temperature

original_description: The preparation boards are good aids for users who have reduced function in one or both hands. Many kitchen boards are also equipped with a clamping tray, where, for example, a bowl can be held in place. Machine washable at 65. Length 31.5 cm, width 29.5 cm, weight 1.3 kg. Material: Polystyrene and stainless steel.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Fix Preparation Board is a versatile assistive technology designed to aid individuals with reduced hand function. This board is particularly useful in the kitchen, featuring a clamping tray that can securely hold items such as bowls in place. Crafted from polystyrene and stainless steel, it is durable and machine washable at 65 degrees Celsius. With dimensions of 31.5 cm in length and 29.5 cm in width, and weighing 1.3 kg, it is both compact and sturdy, making it an ideal tool for enhancing independence in daily tasks.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living activities
Facilitate independent meal preparation

original_description:
WhirlSpray shower technology with five pressure settings that can be regulated
Gently cleaning lady wash
Rimless Rimfree ceramic pan
Odour extraction
Warm air dryer
Seat heating
Fully-automatic descaling programme
Handy remote control with clear overview of functions
Compatible with the Geberit AquaClean app

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Geberit AquaClean Tuma Comfort is a state-of-the-art bidet toilet that combines advanced technology with comfort and hygiene. It features WhirlSpray shower technology with five adjustable pressure settings for a gentle and thorough cleaning experience. The rimless ceramic pan ensures easy cleaning and maintenance. Additionally, it includes an odour extraction system, a warm air dryer, and a seat heating function for added comfort. The fully-automatic descaling program ensures long-term performance, while the handy remote control and compatibility with the Geberit AquaClean app provide convenient operation and customization.
goals: Promote personal autonomy and dignity in toileting and daily routines
Maintain hygiene

original_description: Lightweight inflatable beach ball, used for both throwing - / seize exercises in water.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The item is a lightweight, inflatable beach ball designed for both recreational and therapeutic use. It is typically used in water-based activities and exercises, such as throwing and seizing, to improve motor skills, coordination, and strength. The ball can also be used to promote social interaction as a consequence of being thrown from person to person. The beach ball is easy to inflate and deflate, making it highly portable and convenient for use in various settings, including pools, beaches, and physical therapy sessions. Its bright colors and durable material ensure it is both visually appealing and long-lasting.
goals: Promote overall physical well-being through engaging water activities.
Improve familiarity and confidence in and around water.
Improve motor skills, coordination and strength.
Foster social connections and enjoyment in recreational settings.
Support rehabilitation and recovery through therapeutic exercises.
healthcare_challenges: Rehabilitation needs following injury or surgery

original_description: GottaGo is an innovative, compact, portable toilet seat which provides you with the consistency needed for toileting success. Designed with active families in mind, we are lifting the limits on where you can go and for how long by providing a comfortable toilet seat which can be used both home and away.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Firefly GottaGo is an innovative, portable toilet seat designed to provide consistent and reliable toileting support for individuals with special needs. Its compact and lightweight design makes it highly portable, allowing users to use it both at home and on the go. The seat is engineered to be comfortable and easy to use, with a sturdy frame and adjustable features to accommodate different users. It is particularly beneficial for families who need to manage toileting needs while traveling or in various environments. The seat also assists with toilet training.
goals: Obtain independence and dignity in personal care routines
Improve hygiene
Toilet training
Travel

original_description: Walking stick with four legs. Distance between legs: 23x24 cm.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Four Leg Walking Stick is a mobility aid designed to provide enhanced stability and support for individuals who need assistance with walking. It features a unique four-legged base, with each leg spaced 23 cm apart horizontally and 24 cm apart vertically, ensuring a wide and stable stance. The stick is equipped with a comfortable handle and a hook at the top for easy carrying when not in use. The sturdy construction and non-slip feet make it suitable for various terrains, offering reliable support and reducing the risk of falls. This walking stick is ideal for those who require additional stability beyond what a traditional single-leg cane provides.
goals: Promote everyday mobility in all settings
Mitigate fall risk
Access outdoor activities, including walking in the community and natural areas
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairment not requiring a wheelchair
Age-related decline in mobility and balance

original_description:
BioWaveGO, uses high-frequency neurostimulation through the skin directly to the pain nerves, inhibits the propagation of the action potential and blocks the transmission of pain signals to the brain.
100 pct. drug-free, wearable, FDA-cleared and CE-certified, smarter pain-blocking technology.
Easy to use and long-term effect on 8h after 30min use.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The BioWaveGO is a cutting-edge, wearable device designed to provide drug-free pain relief through high-frequency neurostimulation. This innovative technology works by inhibiting the propagation of pain signals to the brain, effectively blocking pain transmission. The device is FDA-cleared and CE-certified, ensuring its safety and efficacy. BioWaveGO is easy to use and offers a long-term effect, providing up to 8 hours of relief after just 30 minutes of use. Its compact and portable design makes it ideal for on-the-go pain management.
goals: Effectively manage pain
Improve stamina for daily activities
Reduce reliance on pain medication
Increase participation in occupational and community activities
Enhance mental and emotional wellness
healthcare_challenges: Conditions that cause persistent pain, such as arthritis, fibromyalgia, and post-surgical pain

series_name: Air purifier with HEPA, 55 m2, Coway
original_description:
Air purifier for people with allergy, asthma, respiratory disease and lung disease.
Cleans the air for particles and gas species that can trigger the above.
The air purifier filters the air mechanically with HEPA - and charcoal filter and thus emits no ozone. Fits rooms up to 55 m2.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Coway air purifier is a high-efficiency device designed to improve indoor air quality, particularly for individuals suffering from allergies, asthma, and respiratory diseases. This air purifier is equipped with a HEPA filter and a charcoal filter, which effectively remove airborne particles and gaseous pollutants. The device is capable of cleaning the air in rooms up to 55 square meters, making it suitable for medium to large living spaces. Notably, the air purifier operates without emitting ozone, ensuring a safe and healthy environment.
goals: Improved air quality in living or working spaces
Minimize exposure to allergens and pollutants for enhanced respiratory health
Minimize the spread of infectious diseases
healthcare_challenges: Sensitivity to airborne pollutants and irritants

series_name: Cotton Velvet Cover for SAFE Med Ear Pillow no. 115
original_description:
Cotton velvet cover for SAFE Med Ear Pillow is optimal skin friendly, very soft and elastic in light beige color. 
80 percent Cotton 20 percent Polyester
Wash at 60 C no shrinkage
Wash at 95 C up to 5 percent shrinkage
Tumble dry at medium temperature

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Cotton Velvet Cover for SAFE Med Ear Pillow no. 115 is a high-quality, skin-friendly pillow cover designed for comfort and durability. Made from a blend of 80% cotton and 20% polyester, this cover is incredibly soft and elastic, ensuring a comfortable sleeping experience. The light beige color adds a touch of elegance to any bedroom decor. The cover is designed to fit the SAFE Med Ear Pillow perfectly, providing support and comfort for users. It is machine-washable, with instructions to wash at 60°C for no shrinkage or up to 95°C for up to 5% shrinkage. Tumble drying at a medium temperature is also recommended for easy maintenance.
goals: Promote a clean and hygienic sleeping environment
Ensure daily hygiene
Improve sleep quality
healthcare_challenges: Pressure ulcers and skin breakdown due to prolonged lying on one side
